channel.title: Robots on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Robots on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Move Aside, Chatbots: AI Humanoids Are Here
item.description: Today on Uncanny Valley, we talk about why the AI industry is investing in the development of humanoid robots, and what that means for us non-robots.

item.title: Move Aside, Chatbots: AI Humanoids Are Here
item.description: Today on Uncanny Valley, we talk about why the AI industry is investing in the development of humanoid robots, and what that means for us non-robots.

item.title: OpenAI Ramps Up Robotics Work in Race Toward AGI
item.description: The company behind ChatGPT is putting together a team capable of developing algorithms to control robots and appears to be hiring roboticists who work specifically on humanoids.

item.title: OpenAI Ramps Up Robotics Work in Race Toward AGI
item.description: The company behind ChatGPT is putting together a team capable of developing algorithms to control robots and appears to be hiring roboticists who work specifically on humanoids.

item.title: Inside the Man vs. Machine Hackathon
item.description: At a weekend hackathon in San Francisco, more than 100 coders gathered to test whether they could beat AI—and win a $12,500 cash prize.

item.title: Inside the Man vs. Machine Hackathon
item.description: At a weekend hackathon in San Francisco, more than 100 coders gathered to test whether they could beat AI—and win a $12,500 cash prize.

item.title: Tesla Proposes a Trillion-Dollar Bet That It's More Than Just Cars
item.description: Tesla’s board wants to give Elon Musk an unprecedented $1 trillion pay package. To get all the money, he has to make robots and robotaxis work.

item.title: Tesla Proposes a Trillion-Dollar Bet That It's More Than Just Cars
item.description: Tesla’s board wants to give Elon Musk an unprecedented $1 trillion pay package. To get all the money, he has to make robots and robotaxis work.

item.title: 3 Best Robot Lawn Mowers (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These roving robots are expensive alternatives to some good old-fashioned yard work, but they’re finally good enough to consider if you’d rather sip an iced tea and watch the robot go by.

item.title: 3 Best Robot Lawn Mowers (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These roving robots are expensive alternatives to some good old-fashioned yard work, but they’re finally good enough to consider if you’d rather sip an iced tea and watch the robot go by.

item.title: This Robot Only Needs a Single AI Model to Master Humanlike Movements
item.description: Atlas, Boston Dynamics’ dancing humanoid, can now use a single model for walking and grasping—a significant step toward general-purpose robot algorithms.

item.title: This Robot Only Needs a Single AI Model to Master Humanlike Movements
item.description: Atlas, Boston Dynamics’ dancing humanoid, can now use a single model for walking and grasping—a significant step toward general-purpose robot algorithms.

item.title: ElliQ Review: An AI Companion Bot for Lonely Elders
item.description: The AI-powered ElliQ robot and smart display aim to improve life for older folks living alone.
